text: Croy-Romainmôtier railway station () is a railway station in the municipality of Croy, in the Swiss canton of Vaud. It is an intermediate stop on the standard gauge Simplon line of Swiss Federal Railways and is served by local trains only. == Services == The following services stop at Croy-Romainmôtier: * RER Vaud: ** : hourly service between and ; one daily round-trip continues from Villeneuve to . ** : rush-hour service between and via Vallorbe. == References == == External links == * * Category:Railway stations in the canton of Vaud Category:Swiss Federal Railways stations
title: Croy-Romainmôtier railway station
